sm.seat_id, sm.seat_start_time FROM user_mst um left outer join receipt_mst rm on(rm.user_id = um.user_id) left outer join seat_mst sm on(sm.user_id = um.user_id) WHERE um.user_id = #{user_id};

FROM reserved_seat_mst rsm left outer join user_mst um on(um.user_id = rsm.user_id) WHERE rsm.user_id= 0;
